author: gartung
body: The only way to avoid reporting the link to statics in ```edm::ConcurrentHadronizerFilter<Pythia8Hadronizer, gen::ConcurrentExternalDecayDriver>::filter()```  is to mark all statics linked through the base class as safe. To avoid doing this just filter edm::ConcurrentHadronizerFilter<Pythia8Hadronize  from the modules2statics report.
title: Filter 'edm::ConcurrentHadronizerFilter<Pythia8Hadronizer' in modules2statics report
